transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+4% Ally Team Critical Damage
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Beware the Scissor Girl
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to grant the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nDeals <color=#28d9ed>3%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000025_1_1]</color> chance to grant the caster increased <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000025_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\nDeals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000025_1_2]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Surprise!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>60%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt if the caster has increased <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Adds 5% of the target's Max Health as fixed damage

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreases the chance to activate buffs by 20%

description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000025_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000025_2_1] turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt if the caster has increased <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: A Present for You!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals significantly increased damage if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> is currently increased. Deals <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>. After using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> and inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\nDeals significantly increased damage if the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> is currently increased. Deals <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000025_3_1]</color> of the target's Max Health as fixed damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color>. After using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000025_3_4]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000025_3_4] turn(s)</color> and inflict <color=#28d9ed>Bleeding</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000025_3_3] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases the <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> of all characters participating in the Skill Chain by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Heals Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of damage dealt.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases the <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> of all characters participating in the Skill Chain by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Heals Health by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> of damage dealt.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
